trs: I started to write my MBA earlier on, some months ago, I met with my supervisor, discussed ... This way I wrote the first 10 pages. 80 pages remained to be written. Two nights before deadline, I was about to finish writing it. In the end my thesis came out with 120 pages.'    ({www.babyblog.ru})
